description: This Java class implements a service layer for managing notes in a backend application, providing methods to create, list, retrieve, update, and delete notes, utilizing a repository for persistence.

classes.name: NoteService
classes.description: Service class managing CRUD operations for notes, acting as an intermediary between controllers and data repositories.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Creates a new note from the provided request data and returns a response DTO.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Retrieves all notes as a list of response DTOs.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Fetches a specific note by ID, throwing an exception if not found.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Updates an existing note identified by ID with new data, returning the updated note.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Deletes a note by ID, throwing an exception if it does not exist.

methods.name: toResponse
methods.description: Converts a Note entity into a NoteDtos.Response DTO for API responses.
